tab1.text1:
General Rules

~ Racism and/or discrimination of ANY kind will not be tolerated
~ Racism and/or discrimination of ANY kind will not be tolerated
~ Do not threaten DDOS, DOX ANY member/Server
~ Do not Talk about Cheating, ESP, Aimbot, Duping, Meshing, Exploits
~ Do not Promote other servers without admin/owner approval
~ Spamming in-game and/or discord will not be tolerated
~ Threats and/or abuse to staff or any member of this discord will not be tolerated

Game Rules

~ Using programs/Exploits to gain an advantage is not allowed, this includes BUT not limited to (ESP, Aimbot, Exploits, Glitches)
~ Building in any of the banned locations listed in {#Server-Info} is prohibited
~ Mesh raiding, living in the mesh, placing structures in the mesh is prohibited
~ Teaming/Ally Raiding is not allowed
~ Building into a base/ Box raiding of ANY kind is not allowed
~ Using structures to LOS into a base is prohibited
~ Character/Tribe Names cannot include Human or 123, They MUST be unique
~ Impersonating admins, another player/tribe is forbidden
~ Excessive spamming around your base is not allowed


Extra Notes

~ Dinoâ€™s, Structures, Items that are lost due to Ark, Server roll backs, DDOS, Crashes will not be replaced
~ YOU are responsible for what your tribe does, this includes insiding. (Invite at your own risk)
~ You are not allowed to keep duped loot, if you find a base with duped loot create a ticket

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.LightBlue>Ini Header:</>

\[WBUI2]


INI-Options:

JsonURL="url"  -  default: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DC-Modding/WBUI2-Wiki/main/default.json"

You have to host the file as "raw" somewhere and enter the URL to it wrapped in " ". You can use github (linked below). After uploading the file you'll find a button called "raw". click the button and copy the URL. Or use any other hosting site which offers linking to a raw JSON output.

For a more detailed instruction checkout the Wiki linked down below.


You can trigger an update of the JSON via console command:
cheat scriptcommand WBUI2 update
tab2.text2:
OpenButton  -  0/1/2/3/4/5/6, default:0, 0=F1, 1=F2, 2=F3, 3=F4, 4=F5, 5=Delete, 6=Home  -  Determines the button the player needs to press to open the UI.

HideIcon  -  true/false, default: false  -  If true the Icon in the bottom left corner vanishes after some time.

HideIconAfter  -  integer, default: 60  -  Determines after how many seconds the Icon vanishes.

IconURL  -  "URL", default: "https://i.imgur.com/OZ6xOjY.png"  -  You can upload a custom image somewhere (e.g. imgur, link down below) and it will be used as the Icon in the bottom left.

DisableIconText  -  true/false, default:false  -  If true the text "F1 for Info" will not be displayed.

IconPosition  -  0/1/2/3, default:0, 0=Top Left, 1=Top Right, 2=Bottom Right, 3=Bottom Left  -  Set the position of the Icon.

IconTextColor  -  0/1/2/3/4/5/6/7/8, default:0, 0=Light Blue, 1=Red, 2=Green, 3=Blue, 4=Yellow, 5=Orange, 6=Violet, 7=Black, 8=White  -  Sets the color of the "F1 For Info" text.

OpenOnStart  -  true/false, default: true  -  If true the UI will open automatically after the player spawned.

OpenOnStartOnlyNewPlayers  -  true/false, default: true  -  If true the UI only opens automatically the first time the player spawns on the server.

UpdateInterval  -  integer, default: 12  -  This value determines the time in hours the mod automatically pulls the JSON from the URL to update settings.

GENERAL INFORMATION:


For the rest of the settings pls checkout the Wiki or the example JSON linked down below.

In order to pass the JSON-validation you have to use "*backslash*n" without a space to generate newlines. although the mod should handle regular newlines just fine.

Special characters like " have to be escaped with a *backslash*

You can trigger an update of the JSON via console command: "cheat scriptcommand WBUI2 update"

Be careful with the file size of the images. The user have to download the images.
